title: [K-12] Understanding Learning Effects in K-12 Through Virtual Character Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Educational Technology or General Interest in Education
context.additional_context: Learners interact with virtual characters in VR/simulation environments to explore K-12 educational effectiveness, including hands-on activities using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of virtual character-based learning on academic achievement improvement in K-12 learners.
Learners can suggest at least three educational strategies for utilizing virtual characters in terms of motivation.
Learners can design formative assessment tools to measure learning effectiveness while interacting with virtual characters in VR/simulation environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
